subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
Ethics and Official Misconduct
Corruption (Institutional)
lead_paragraph: Valcke, Sepp Blatter’s top deputy for nearly a decade, was placed on leave in September amid accusations he was part of a scheme to sell World Cup tickets for personal profit.
snippet: Valcke, Sepp Blatter’s top deputy for nearly a decade, was placed on leave in September amid accusations he was part of a scheme to sell World Cup tickets for personal profit.
